Text.Name: Esoterica_SYS_LOST
Text.Desc: A lost building that nobody recognizes. \n(Empty)
Text.EffectDesc: ไม่มี

Text.Name: Esoterica_LunHui1
Text.Desc: Miraculous secret manual from modern times, it allows one to achieve physical rejuvenation.
Text.EffectDesc: Increases Perception by 10%.\nIncreases Intelligence by 10%.\nIncreases Luck by 10%.

Text.Name: Esoterica_LunHui2
Text.Desc: Miraculous secret manual from modern times, it allows one to concentrate พลังชี่ in one's head, stimulating thought process and improving Intelligence. And...
Text.EffectDesc: Increases Perception by 10%.\nIncreases Intelligence by 10%.

Text.Name: Esoterica_LunHui3
Text.DisplayName: แรงเหลือเชื่อ
Text.Desc: Ultimate technique unique to Dugu Xing, it allows one to suddenly burst out with incredible power.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Learn Miracle: แรงเหลือเชื่อ\nUltimate technique unique to Dugu Xing, it allows one to suddenly burst out with incredible power.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Esoterica_LunHui4
Text.DisplayName: กฎเซียนคุนลุน
Text.Desc: Secret technique passed on from an unknown เซียน in the Kunlun Mountain, it improves one's Intelligence and Constitution.
Text.EffectDesc: Increases Intelligence by 10%.\nIncreases Constitution by 10%.

Text.Name: Esoterica_LunHui5
Text.DisplayName: ยันต์อธิษฐาน
Text.Desc: Incantation that makes people feel safe and happy.
Text.EffectDesc: Unlock Talisman: \nยันต์อธิษฐาน

Text.Name: Other_Esoterica_DanXia1
Text.Desc: Miraculous skill inspired by the scenery of verdant cliffs on Mt. Sunshade, it increases one's Spell damage.
Text.EffectDesc: Increases Spell damage

Text.Name: Other_Esoterica_DanXia2
Text.Desc: Miraculous technique inspired by the scenery of verdant cliffs on Mt. Sunshade, long-term practice of it adjusts one's Mental State and stabilizes one's primeval พลังชี่.
Text.EffectDesc: Improves Mental State.\nExtends Lifespan.

Text.Name: Other_Esoterica_DengXian1
Text.Desc: Ultimate sword skill invented by the เซียน Emperor of the East. Harness the imperial power dwelling in the Purple Star with your วิญญาณบรรพกาล and integrate it into sword aura, making it absolutely unstoppable. This volume also recorded the crafting recipe for Borealis, a Legacy Artifact invented by เซียน Emperor of the East.
Text.EffectDesc: Significantly increases Artifact Power.\n Acquire Legacy Artifact: \nBorealis

Text.Name: Other_Esoterica_JiuHua
Text.DisplayName: Codex of Dragon and ฟินิกซ์
Text.Desc: Secret technique invented by ancient sages, who were inspired by analyzing the way the inner พลังชี่ circulate within dragons and phoenixes. Mastering this technique allows one to transform one's mortal body into that of a dragon and ฟินิกซ์, improving physical qualities.
Text.EffectDesc:
Increases Perception by 10%.
Increases Constitution by 10%.
Increases Charisma by 10%.
Increases Intelligence by 10%.
Extends Lifespan.

Text.Name: Other_Esoterica_LongHu1
Text.Desc: Sword Will inspired by observing the scenery of a white rainbow splitting stones at the Skypass Falls in Mt. Tiger Paw. Integrating it within your sword skill massively increase Artifact impact power.
Text.EffectDesc: Improves Artifact Impact

Text.Name: Other_Esoterica_LongHu2
Text.Desc: Breathing technique inspired by observing the scenery at the Skypass Falls on Mt. Tiger Paw, it increases your พลังชี่ Recovery Rate.
Text.EffectDesc: Increases พลังชี่ recovery rate

Text.Name: Other_Esoterica_ChiLianYuan
Text.Desc: Secret crafting method passed down from the ancient เซียน Nangong Hong, employing it greatly improves Success Rate when crafting artifacts. \n[color=#D06508]This is in appreciation of the first player to successfully Survive Tribulation: Emerald Palace[/color]
Text.EffectDesc: Significantly increases Success Rate when crafting artifacts.

Text.Name: Other_Esoterica_ChiLianYuan1
Text.DisplayName: Secret Record of Nangong's Tribulation Survival
Text.Desc: A set of methods summed up by the ancient เซียน Nangong Hong before she ascended. Practicing it allows one to trick the ways of heaven, improving the cultivator's foundation. \n[color=#D06508]This is in appreciation of the first player to successfully Survive Tribulation: Emerald Palace[/color]
Text.EffectDesc: Increases Perception by 10%.\nIncreases Intelligence by 10%.

Text.Name: Other_Esoterica_XuanKong
Text.Desc: A heaven defying and fortune reversing technique discovered by the ancient เซียน Yuan Ruoxue who drew her inspiration from the Heavenly Tribulation itself. Greatly improves Luck. \n[color=#D06508]This is in appreciation of the first player to successfully challenge destiny with a character of the lowest talent, who eventually shaped Tier I Core and ascended: Actually not me[/color]
Text.EffectDesc: Increases Luck by 20%.

Text.Name: Other_Esoterica_ShanHeJue
Text.Desc: Secret technique discovered by the Celestial Patriarch who was inspired by the circulation of Dragon's Vein, it includes several ways of rebuilding terrains by utilizing the เมล็ดดวง.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Learn Miracle: 
Lake Shaping
Land Shaping
Creator's ดินวิญญาณ
Creator's Spiritual Pond
Fertile Soil
Acquire Elixir Recipes: 
Spirit Seed
Fortune Sand
Unlock Building: 
Jade Pond of Creator[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Other_Esoterica_LongDan
Text.Desc: Secret technique that took its inspiration from memory fragments of มังกรหลาก.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Acquire the following elixir recipe: \nDragon Elixir\nGreatly increases Artifact Power.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Other_Esoterica_FengDan
Text.DisplayName: ฟินิกซ์ Spirit Soul
Text.Desc: Secret technique that took its inspiration from memory fragments of ฟินิกซ์.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Acquire the following elixir recipe: \nPhoenix Elixir\nGreatly increases Spell Power.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Other_Esoterica_ZhuLongDan
Text.Desc: Secret technique that took its inspiration from the memory fragments of มังกรประทีป.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Acquire the following elixir recipe: 
Balance Spirit Pill
 Acquire the crafting method of Legacy Artifact: 
Draconic Tablet
Fundamentally increases Barrier Power by a significant margin.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Other_Esoterica_FenShen1
Text.DisplayName: พลังชี่ of Triple Purity
Text.Desc: Secret Law of Spirit Forging from ancient schools of creed, thought to be long lost. Cultivation of this method will split one's วิญญาณบรรพกาล, creating three วิญญาณย่อย.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Gains three วิญญาณย่อย.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Other_Esoterica_FenShen2
Text.DisplayName: Apparition of Three Corpses: Good Self Slaying
Text.Desc: Secret move of spirit-splitting invented by ancient cultivators based on the method of slaying three corpses to achieve enlightenment. Practitioner of this manual can utilize one's own good consciousness as the catalyst to split out one branch of วิญญาณย่อย.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Gains one วิญญาณย่อย.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Other_Esoterica_FenShen3
Text.DisplayName: Apparition of Three Corpses: Evil Self Slaying
Text.Desc: Secret move of spirit-splitting invented by ancient cultivators based on the method of slaying three corpses to achieve enlightenment. Practitioner of this manual can utilize one's own good consciousness as the catalyst to split out one branch of วิญญาณย่อย.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Gains one วิญญาณย่อย.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Other_Esoterica_FenShen4
Text.DisplayName: Apparition of Three Corpses: True Self Slaying
Text.Desc: Secret move of spirit-splitting invented by ancient cultivators based on the method of slaying three corpses to achieve enlightenment. Practitioner of this manual can utilize one's own endogenous consciousness as the catalyst to split out one branch of วิญญาณย่อย.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Gains one วิญญาณย่อย.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Other_Esoterica_YanHuangTongShi
Text.Desc: Book that covered five thousand years of history of the country of Serica. It recorded a wide variety of extensive contents, within which are many school of thoughts that are very inspirational to cultivation.
Text.EffectDesc: Increases Intelligence by 20%.\nIncreases พลังชี่ Sense by 5.
